version_description:
-Minor bug fixes and improvements.
-New effect: Luma Fade.

-Minor bug fixes and improvements.

-Minor bug fixes and improvements.
-New effect: Luma Fade.

New Feature:
-Added a search bar for effect searching.
New Effects:
-Effect->Color Correction->Basic Color Correction(Exposure, Contrast, White Balance, etc.)
-Effect->Stylize->Emboss
-Fill->4 Color Gradient

New Feature:
-Expanded audio bands from 12 to 26, now the audio reactor should be more sensitive.
-Added a color picker to pick color from screen.
New Effects:
-Mask->Chroma Key
-ColorCorrection->Tint
Terms of use updated:
NodeVideo Examples are not allowed to export due to license restrictions.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Bug fixes and improvements.

New
-New tool available: Effect Mask. you can now apply mask to effects directly by clicking mask button in property header.
Improvements and Fixes
-(UI)Expanded Keyframes's touch area when dragged on screen edge.
-(Audio)Expanded audio bands from 26 to 31(ISO standard).
-(Audio)Audio reactor smoothing should work properly now.
-(Effect->BasicCorrection )Fixed black noises when exposure is too high.
-(Effects)Fixed all effects' alpha clipping behaviour, now effects should work properly on transparency layers.
-(AD)Reduced AD show up frequency.

New
-New tool available: Effect Mask. you can now apply mask to effects directly by clicking mask button in property header.
Improvements and Fixes
-(UI)Expanded Keyframes's touch area when dragged on screen edge.
-(Audio)Expanded audio bands from 26 to 31(ISO standard).
-(Audio)Audio reactor smoothing should work properly now.
-(Effect->BasicCorrection )Fixed black noises when exposure is too high.
-(Effects)Fixed all effects' alpha clipping behaviour, now effects should work properly on transparency layers.
-(AD)Reduced AD show up frequency.

New
-New tool available: Effect Mask. you can now apply mask to effects directly by clicking mask button in property header.
Improvements and Fixes
-(UI)Expanded Keyframes's touch area when dragged on screen edge.
-(Audio)Expanded audio bands from 26 to 31(ISO standard).
-(Audio)Audio reactor smoothing should work properly now.
-(Effect->BasicCorrection )Fixed black noises when exposure is too high.
-(Effects)Fixed all effects' alpha clipping behaviour, now effects should work properly on transparency layers.
-(AD)Reduced AD show up frequency.
Fixed crashes while loading project that contains masked "Color Correction" effects.
Fixed crashes while loading project that contains masked "Color Correction" effects.
Fixed crashes while loading project that contains masked "Color Correction" effects.

New:
-----------------------
1, Professional Color Masking Tool
Try [New Property->Mask->Color Mask] to learn more. You can use it to replace colors in the video, eg. change cloth colors.
2, Audio Visualization Bars
Try [New Node->Fill->Audio Visualizer] or checkout the new example to learn more, need to reinstall the app.
3, Shape Mask
You can apply shape mask to Node directly now, try[New Property->Mask->Shape Mask].
------------------------
We are pretty sure by combining these effects with audio reactor you can create stunning effects never seen before. For example change a dancer's cloth color with the audio, then apply a "Glow" effect on it. Detail tutorials will come soon, please stay tuned!

New:
-Particle System: Snow, Rain, Embers. Parameters are fully adjustable, as always you can even make particles dance with audio reactor.
Please try [New Node->3D->Particle], or checkout the new Audio Visualization example to learn more(need to reinstall the app).
-All examples now include a video tutorial, you can see it directly in the example project.(need to reinstall the app).
Fixes and Improvements:
-Fixed some transparency issues: "Shape Mask", "Luma Fade", "Emboss".
-Fixed an issue where the first frame of the exported video is black.
-Added "Clip Mask" option to the Effect Mask Tool.
-[UI] Added Center controller in mask tools.
-[UI] Improved Zooming controller.

-All examples now include a video tutorial, you can see it directly in the example project.(need to reinstall the app).

New:
-Pen Tool. Yep, we've made another breakthrough for mobile devices...please check it out in below locations:
1, New Node -> Shape -> Shape Type -> Pen Tool
2, Any Effect Mask -> Shape Type -> Pen Tool
2, New Property -> Shape Mask -> Shape Type -> Pen Tool

Fixes&Improvements:
-Improved ChromaKey, both green color and blue color are supported now.
-Added a very professional Color Correction example, reinstall the app to learn more.
-Minor bug fixes and improvements.

New Effects:
-Perspective Transform [New Property->Effect->Distort->Perspective Transform]
-Twirl [New Property->Effect->Distort->Twirl]

Fixes&Improvements:
-Improved wiggle for paired parameters, eg, the x, y of position will be wiggled in a random phase.
-Improved Lens Distortion Effect.
-Fixes for potential crash after undo.
-Removed unskippable AD when exporting is finished...(Please give us a good review, Thanks.)

Deprecated:(Will be removed in the future)
[New Node -> Fill -> Gradient] please use Layer Styles instead.
[New Property-> Effect -> Distort -> Radial Distort] please use Lens Distortion instead.

New Tool:
-Sequencer Tool. You can use it to cut video easily, check out [New Node -> Tool Box -> Sequencer] to learn more
New Effects:
-Dissolve pack, more than 20 different advance dissolve effects.[New Property->Asset Store->Dissolve]
-Rays.[New Property->Asset Store->Rays]
-Also added a Dissolve&Explosion example to demonstrate these two effects above, you need to reinstall the app to get the example.
New IAP:
-One time purchase option is available now, get it early to save your money!

For some reason the "Lifetime Pro" IAP in last version has been sent back so we have to resubmit a new version. For release notes please refer to v 1.1.2.

New:
-[UI] Now a "Screen Magnifier" window will show up while dragging UI handles.
-[New Property->Asset Store->Flare]. Pro is required.
-New Shape is available: Linear.
Fixes & Improvements:
-Greatly improved UI performance, especially for undo&redo.
-Fix for issue where Blur for PenTool is not working.

New:
-Paint Layer. blazing fast, supports animation! checkout [New Node -> Paint] to learn more.
-Jump single frame is now availbale, just expand the bottom time line menu you will see the button.

New:
-Template QRCode. by which you can encode your project to the exported video and share them conveniently.
--In Export menu, Check on the "append template" option, then your project code will be appended to the exported video.
--In Home menu, you can load template by click "Load Template" button.

Fixes&Improvements:
-Some fixes and improvements for landscape UI.

Changes:
-NO ADS ANYMORE.

This app is built and maintained by 3 young programmers in China. We don't have any marketing resources in foreign countries and we apologize for the lack of tutorials. If you are making tutorial videos please contact us, we can introduce your social account to other users.

Fixes & Improvements:
-Fixed various bugs with per-frame editing:
--PenTool Keyframes sometimes messed up when keyframes are too close.
--Can't update keyframe value when keyframes are too close.
--Curve value not accurate when keyframes are too close.

-UI:
--Zoom on keyframes now are synchronized with the time line.(Landscape mode)
--Clip trim icon will only be showed when selected.

-[Motion Tile] now supports motion blur.

This update is mainly optimized for iOS14:
-No longer need album reading permission
-Picking media supports multiple selection
-The picked video will not be compressed
We strongly recommend you upgrade to iOS14 for a better experience.

We strongly recommend you upgrade to iOS14 for a better experience.

This update is mainly optimized for iOS14:
-No longer need album reading permission
-Picking media supports multiple selection
-The picked video will not be compressed
We strongly recommend you upgrade to iOS14 for a better experience.

-Industry Level Color Grading.[New Property -> Color Grading]

Optical Flow 2.0! Better result on time interpolation. Optical Flow is still under improvement, when it is perfect enough we will launch per-pixel motion blur and 3D tracking!
----------------------------------------------------
Happy new year everyone, in 2011 we will continue to work hard to bring better experience and more features! Thank you all for your support.

Optical Flow 2.0! Better result on time interpolation. Optical Flow is still under improvement, when it is perfect enough we will launch per-pixel motion blur and 3D tracking!
----------------------------------------------------
Happy new year everyone, in 2011 we will continue to work hard to bring better experience and more features! Thank you all for your support.

Optical Flow 2.0! Better result on time interpolation. Optical Flow is still under improvement, when it is perfect enough we will launch per-pixel motion blur and 3D tracking!

Happy new year everyone, in 2011 we will continue to work hard to bring better experience and more features! Thank you all for your support.

-Now supports 4K export(Requires new project)
-Optimized the memory usage when exporting, now there should be no crashes when exporting multiple layers
-Curve editing supports separate display of XYZ, making it more convenient to edit 3D curves
-App will automatically lock the device rotation after 5 seconds after startup

In this update we added 2 new free effects for gaming video. Hope you like it!
1, Brand new Ripple Effect, Full adjustable[New Property -> Asset Store -> Ripple].
2, Counter Animation[Create a new Text layer, tap "Text Animation", then select "Counter"].
3, Support import custom 3D LUT[Add a new "Color Grading" Property, then tap the "menu" icon on the top right].
4, Simplified the project resolution option.

4, Simplified the project resolution option.

In this update we added 2 new free effects for gaming video. Hope you like it!
1, Brand new Ripple Effect, Full adjustable[New Property -> Asset Store -> Ripple].
2, Counter Animation[Create a new Text layer, tap "Text Animation", then select "Counter"].

-New Effect: [New Node->Fill->Asset Store->Radial Rays].
-UI: Video layer supports "trim", you can find it next to "scissors" in the timeline menu.
-UI: Curve editor supports grid display and snap.
-Improve：Glow effect now supports "Preserve Alpha".
-Improve：3D layer supports per layer blending and transparency adjustment. you can find them in the "Transform" property.

New:
- Text layer supports [path warping]!
Fix:
- [Important]Fixed quality loss in some videos(darkening, blurring).
- Added "Edge Width" to Motion Tile, You can use it to get rid of border edges.
- Added "Random Seed" to Wiggle Editor.
- Improved Timeline Editing.
